KitKat::

She smiled.  "Then I shall go and meet with Megatron then. Thank you 
for your help in this matter Aracnia." She stood and left the room. 
She went to the bridge and contacted Megatron on the visual 
link. "Megatron, this is KitKat. After due consideration, I have 
decided to meet with you.  I shall meet you at the forest opening, 
two miles from my base. In two days.  As you said yourself, You and 
I, alone, no tricks or weapons. Just us and we talk, let me know what 
your answer is. KitKat out,"

She turned off the link and left the message for him. She opened her 
link. "Destructor, I need to talk to you. I am meeting him in two 
days. I wanted you to know. Contact me when you can."

She went back to her lab and finished working on her clone. It was 
now 90% complete. She sighed. She hadn't heard from Drillbit for a 
few days and she was getting worried. She also had Destructor on her 
mind. "Starscream, when you get a chance, contact me."

She needed to get things in order before they got out of hand.
She turned and walked into the other CR room and saw the two  bots 
and DarkMouse. She looked at then and nodded to DarkMouse."It's ok 
DarkMouse. What is it that you two need?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia nodded at Kitkat, "Its a good idea. Let him get 
scrapped for our 
> cause. Its the Predacon way." She laughed. "So, should we bring him 
in and 
> talk to him about it?"
> 
>     Megatron paced. The females hadnt called him back yet. What 
could take 
> them so long? They were playing mind games with him, he knew they 
were. This 
> psycological tourture had better be worth it....
>     "Argh! How long will they take!" Megatron roared in anger. Hell 
Beast 
> just shook his head with his diplomatic knowledge of how these 
types of 
> meetings went.
>     He sished, "Megatron, these things take time. I wouldnt be 
surprized if 
> we didnt hear from them for another week." And then trotted off.
